nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.application

Class GUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.application.GUI

  • public class GUI
extends java.lang.Object
    A GUI with a canvas for displaying the game, as well as other information related to the game state, options and more. (Partly generated using Eclipse's WindowBuilder plugin)
